entry.value: SELECT Id_Usuario AS ID_Alumno, Nombre AS Nombre, CASE WHEN Apellidos IS NULL OR POSITION(' ' IN Apellidos) = 0 THEN Apellidos ELSE SUBSTRING(Apellidos FROM 1 FOR POSITION(' ' IN Apellidos) - 1) END AS Apellido1, CASE WHEN Apellidos IS NULL OR POSITION(' ' IN Apellidos) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTRING(Apellidos FROM POSITION(' ' IN Apellidos) + 1) END AS Apellido2, Grupo AS Grupo, email AS Email FROM flowfile

SELECT 'Act_01' AS ID_Actividad, Id_Usuario AS ID_Alumno, COALESCE(Act_01, 0) AS Nota FROM FLOWFILE UNION ALL SELECT 'Act_02', Id_Usuario, COALESCE(Act_02, 0) FROM FLOWFILE UNION ALL SELECT 'Act_03', Id_Usuario, COALESCE(Act_03, 0) FROM FLOWFILE UNION ALL SELECT 'Act_04', Id_Usuario, COALESCE(Act_04, 0) FROM FLOWFILE UNION ALL SELECT 'Act_05', Id_Usuario, COALESCE(Act_05, 0) FROM FLOWFILE UNION ALL SELECT 'Act_06', Id_Usuario, COALESCE(Act_06, 0) FROM FLOWFILE UNION ALL SELECT 'Act_07', Id_Usuario, COALESCE(Act_07, 0) FROM FLOWFILE UNION ALL SELECT 'Act_08', Id_Usuario, COALESCE(Act_08, 0) FROM FLOWFILE

entry.value:
Select Id_Actividad as ID_Actividad, Actividad as Descripcion, Peso, case when cast(substring(Fecha_Fin from 4 for 2) as integer) in (1, 2, 3) then 1 when cast(substring(Fecha_Fin from 4 for 2) as integer) in (4, 5, 6) then 2 when cast(substring(Fecha_Fin from 4 for 2) as integer) in (7, 8, 9) then 3 when cast(substring(Fecha_Fin from 4 for 2) as integer) in (10, 11, 12) then 4 end as Trimestre, Fecha_Fin, Fecha_Ini
from flowfile
